data.text: Today, Carrie Lam defended the use of the alert system. So after all these years the communication doctrine of HK gov’t is still to “shout out what we think you should know” instead of building bilateral understanding & trust. https://t.co/twSD2LL0Ew

@elgarteo Everything is a failure in Hong Kong
#HongKong
@elgarteo Wondering what's the % of responses that include swear words

Using the emergency alert system to broadcast COVID-19 info is clearly perceived as a misuse. Note the reference to the fable The Boy Who Cried Wolf (狼來了). Indeed, tutorials on switching off the alert are being circulated online. Is that successful public health communication?
